manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brushing alone isn't enough to keep your teeth clean and your gums healthy. According to the American Dental Association (ADA), incorporating mouthwash into your daily routine also allows you to clean tiny crevices in your mouth that cannot be reached by a toothbrush. However, most conventional mouthwash formulas contain harmful ingredients, such as fluoride, alcohol and saccharin, which are bad for your oral health and can actually do more harm than good. Keeping your mouth moist and pH balanced is crucial for maintaining good oral health. Most mouthwashes fall below a 5.5 pH which makes your mouth extremely acidic and can lead to a dry mouth, bad breath, and even cavities.

Features Natural Ingredients Simply Silver Mouthwash contains natural ingredients that are completely safe for your health. The cleansing properties of these ingredients support gum health, alleviate bad breath and promote your body’s natural healing abilities. Our mouthwash is 100% raw, natural and clean in a BPA free bottle. All of our products are made in the USA. Chemical-Free The harmful ingredients in conventional mouthwash formulas can kill the good germs in your mouth, which are crucial for maintaining optimal oral health. Some ingredients can even cause tooth sensitivity and erode tooth enamel. In contrast, SSM gently and thoroughly cleans your teeth and gums without harming good oral germs, thanks to its natural cleansing properties. You won’t find any alcohol, SLS, fluoride, or chemical of any kind in our products. Promotes Fresh Breath Simply Silver Mouthwash is a toxin free, colloidal silver-based solution that is loaded with naturally germ-fighting ingredients. Colloidal silver neutralizes the acids that cause decay, targets the bad bugs only making your breath super fresh and is more effective than alcohol in penetrating plaque causing germs. Your breath will feel fresh for hours!

Simply Silver Mouthwash Mint Flavor Simply Silver Mouthwash Cinnamon Flavor Simply Silver Mouthwash Spearmint Flavor Strong Flavor ✓ ✓ Freshens Breath ✓ ✓ Gum Issues ✓ ✓ Weak Teeth ✓ Mild Flavor ✓ Remineralizes enamel ✓ ✓ ✓ Soothes Dry Mouth ✓ Listerine Alternative ✓ ✓ ACT Alternative ✓ Kid Friendly ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This hygienist is a genius
reviews.reviewText: Love this mouthwash and so grateful to have found it! Quality ingredients. Top notch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for oral thrush and gum care!
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouthwash! I will definitely be buying more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We love this product. The minty taste is subtle and not overpowering. We tend toward natural products and this is a great replacement for traditional mouthwash. We will continue to buy this product. It’s awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Product but Buuuuurrrnnnsss
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mouthwash and it really does work wonders. But good gawd… this stuff burns like the fire pits of hell (especially if it’s in your mouth one second longer than what the makers suggest)! Looking at the ingredients… the makers could seriously back off on the mint stuffs. Yeesh…I started using this right after my last regular dentist checkup. I floss and brush daily but there always seems to be a bit of plaque that I just can’t be rid of. Adding things was the only change in my oral routine so I know it’s what’s improved my oral health. My dentist was giddy with excitement when she did my checkup and saw almost no plaque buildup lolI’ll be sticking with this mouth wash! If the makers of this see this review, please back off of the mints! It burns so bad sometimes it hurts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash has the BEST ingredients. It was created by a dental hygienist and my mouth feels so clean and fresh after using it. Go slow and use a bit because it is very strong. I’ll never go back to the other organic brands: this is the best mouthwash, period.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best mouthwash I've ever used!
reviews.reviewText: I am obsessed with Simply Silver's mouthwash. I ordered the mint flavor, and I did not expect it to work so well. I've used Young Living Thieves Fresh Essence mouthwash in the past, and that used to be my favorite. The price has gone up drastically, and I am NOT paying 19 dollars for 8fl oz of mouthwash. I came across Simply Silver and was pleased to see it's made with only natural ingredients! The 16oz bottle lasted me about 2 months. It's spicy but doesn't burn, and it leaves my mouth feeling fresh and my breath smelling good. This mouthwash is highly underrated. This is now my go-to. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On my second bottle
reviews.reviewText: Nice product. You may find it is a bit strong on the gums. no problem, prefer rather than too weak. I just dilute it 50% and use it that way. And it lasts longer that way too. My gums do not like full strength. you may have a differing opinion. I hope it remains a stocking item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pain free after one use
reviews.reviewText: I've had teeth problems for ages and now that I'm an adult, it seems I'm getting a root canal every other year. Pain started setting in recently and was making it impossible to sleep. My usual pattern when pain started was to try all sorts of numbing cream on top of compulsively brushing my teeth and swishing with anything I could think of to no avail and eventually can't take the pain anymore and get my tooth yanked. I wondered if there was a mouthwash with colloidal silver in it and looked it up on Amazon. I decided to try this mouthwash first. It was a grueling few days while I waited for the product to get here. The first night I used it, it was pretty intense. I felt like my gums were made out of bubblewrap and the mouthwash was bursting all the bubbles. I took ibuprofen and went to bed. The next morning, all throbbing, aching, and temperature sensitivity was gone. Don't let the brown color turn you off, it just solidified to me that it IS all natural and doesn't have dyes or other junk like commercial mouthwash. I AM SO IMPRESSED AND HAPPY I CAN SKIP THE DENTIST APPOINTMENT! Just try it!
